rooms.description: A spacious entrance hall with eco-friendly materials and natural ventilation, adhering to Vastu principles by positioning near the main door.

Open-plan living area featuring floor-to-ceiling windows for natural light and ventilation; integrates eco-friendly lighting and energy-efficient appliances. Positioned to maximize sunlight during the day.
Modern kitchen with sustainable materials, ample counter space, built-in cabinets, and ventilation aligned to Vastu. Includes energy-efficient appliances.
Dining area adjacent to the kitchen with floor-to-ceiling windows offering a view of the balcony and garden; designed for joint family gatherings.
Service area including laundry, storage, and maintenance space. Incorporates eco-friendly features like water recycling systems.

openings.description: A robust eco-friendly door made of recycled materials, positioned per Vastu guidelines to welcome positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling windows allowing maximum natural light and cross ventilation. Glazed with eco-friendly materials.
Balcony access for each bedroom providing ample outdoor space and ventilation; designed with privacy screens and sustainable materials.
Door leading to the servant's quarters ensuring discreet access while maintaining a seamless aesthetic.

rooms.description: Luxury master bedroom with ample space for storage and a built-in walk-in closet. Floor-to-ceiling windows offering privacy and abundant natural light. Vastu-aligned placement to enhance energy flow.
Additional bedroom with a spacious balcony ensuring private outdoor space. Eco-friendly finishes and natural ventilation are key design elements.

openings.description: Balcony for the second bedroom ensuring privacy and natural ventilation; built with eco-friendly materials.

rooms.description: Dedicated servant's quarters ensuring privacy and functionality. Includes a compact living area and kitchenette with energy-efficient appliances.

openings.description: Access door to the servant's quarters from the main building ensuring easy access while maintaining privacy.
